description: Starts a voice tone analysis task. For more information about voice tone analysis, see Using Amazon Chime SDK voice analytics in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTask
nested_items.description: The details of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a voice tone analysis task, IN_QUEUE, IN_PROGRESS, PARTIAL_SUCCESS, SUCCEEDED, FAILED, or STOPPED.

nested_items.name: CallDetails
nested_items.description: The call details of a voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: TransactionId
nested_items.description: The transaction ID of a Voice Connector call.

nested_items.name: IsCaller
nested_items.description: Identifies a person as the caller or the callee.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was updated.

nested_items.name: StartedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task started.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status of a voice tone analysis task.
